column4: hi, if I upgrade from 9.04 with ext3 file system to 9.10, will the file system change to ext4?
is the new speedy boot up times dependent on ext4 file system? or can you still get faster boot times when upgrading from ext3 Jaunty?
ext4 has a lot of new things. 9.10 is also a re-work. I would recommend re-installing instead of updating
